DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the hypoallergenicity of an extensively hydrolyzed formula with an added probiotic in children with documented milk allergy.
DOC.brief_title: Double Blind Controlled Trial of an Extensively Hydrolyzed Formula With a Probiotic vs. an Extensively Hydrolyzed Formula Without a Probiotic
